definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
Wu Yi (1938-), one of four vice-premiers of the PRC State Council
Puyi, personal name of the last Qing emperor (reigned as child 1909-1911), the subject of Bertolucci's biopic The Last Emperor
Yizheng county level city in Yangzhou 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1], Jiangsu
honor guard/guard of honor/the banner bearing contingent leading a military procession

sentences.english: A dual-channel instantaneous soil radon measurement instrument based on the method of electrostatic collection is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计一套基于静电收集法的双道瞬时土壤测氡仪。

sentences.english: The linear density and unevenness of PET spun staple fiber were measured by vibration method.
sentences.chinese: 介绍用振动仪测试涤纶原丝线密度及其不匀率。

sentences.english: The USB transmission module of portable data acquisition instrument is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种便携式数据采集仪的USB通讯模块。

sentences.english: This CDL tool is very easy to assemble and operate.
sentences.chinese: CDL测井仪打捞工具现场组装快捷，操作方便。

sentences.english: The fulness of the gospel, including all temple ordinances, is then available to us.
sentences.chinese: 丰满的福音，包括所有的圣殿教仪，已经赐与我们。

sentences.english: This paper mainly discussed the design of overland flow velocity detecting instrument based on FPGA.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了基于FPGA的坡面流流速仪。

sentences.english: The radiographic dose on skin was measured with TSD.
sentences.chinese: 热释光剂量仪测试皮肤入射剂量。

sentences.english: The density logger consists of a radiation source .
sentences.chinese: 密度测井仪包括辐射源。

sentences.english: Present numeral logger is complex in structure, easy to trouble and price expensive.
sentences.chinese: 现在的数字测井仪结构复杂，易出故障，价格昂贵。

sentences.english: The rheological properties of cottonseed meal were investigated using a capillary rheometry.
sentences.chinese: 用毛细管流变仪研究了棉籽粉的流变特性。

sentences.english: The sintering temperature and thermal expansion coefficient of the LSGM sample were determined using dilatometer.
sentences.chinese: 用热膨胀仪确定了LSGM的烧结温度及热膨胀系数。

sentences.english: Atypical subdiploid peak was observed by flow cytometry.
sentences.chinese: 流式细胞仪检测出现典型的亚二倍体凋亡峰。

sentences.english: This article gives the design means and work principle for taping electronic component count apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了编带电子元器件点数仪的设计方法和工作原理。

sentences.english: This, of course, annoyed the musician greatly.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这使得公明仪十分生气。

sentences.english: The result indicated that the content of rhizoma polygonati polysaccharide is the highest by sonifier cell disrupter .
sentences.chinese: 结果表明超声波细胞粉碎仪提取的黄精多糖纯度最高。

definition: proton (positively charged nuclear particle)/a prince sent to be held as a hostage in a neighbouring state in ancient China
to resist/imperial/(classical) to drive (a chariot)/to manage/to govern
